column1: Kata Robata////Kata is simply delish. If you've never been
column2: you're missing out. One of my favorite places for sushi. Your taste buds would kick into high gear and quite the mouthgasm! Love the bone marrow but they ran out so I practically ordered everything else! Most definitely always order the king crab & uni! Will melt in your mouth! Scallops and foie gras' always a winner in my book. Do yourself a favor
column3: and just indulge! My mouth is watering just thinking about it
column4: might have to come back soon!!
